metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19967 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.11.x on Intel x86 platformsallowing guest OS users to cause a denial of service (host OS hang) becauseXen does not work around Intel's mishandling of certain HLE transactionsassociated with the KACQUIRE instruction prefix.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
